trans-unit.source: Specifies the impersonation behavior for a service operation on a service instance.
trans-unit.target: サービス インスタンスでサービス操作の権限借用の動作を指定します。

trans-unit.source: Use the ImpersonationOption enumeration to control impersonation in [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] applications.
trans-unit.target: コントロールの権限借用、ImpersonationOption 列挙型を使用して[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]アプリケーションです。

trans-unit.source: This setting interacts with a configuration property on <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations%2A> in the following table.
trans-unit.target: この設定が構成プロパティを使用して対話<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations%2A>次の表にします</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Impersonation is performed if credentials are available and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*> is equal to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 資格情報が利用可能な場合、偽装を実行し、<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*>と等しい<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref></xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*> 。
偽装は実行されません。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*> is equal to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, a validation exception occurs at service startup time.
trans-unit.target: 場合<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*>と等しい<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>サービスの起動時に検証例外が発生します</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*>。
